page.title: 05CRAFTS
page.content: THERE ARE LOTS OF CRAFTS INCLUDING ART, SEWING, WOOD WORK, WRITING, AND MANY MORE. WE MADE A GRAPH TO SHOW WHAT PEOPLE LIKE. 10 PEOPLE LIKE ART 15 PEOPLE LIKE SEWING 4 PEOPLE LIKE WRITING 9 PEOPLE LIKE WOOD WORK THE MOST POPULAR IS SEWING WITH 15. THE LEAST POPULAR IS WRITING WITH 4. AT SCHOOL WE DO ART. FOR ART WE DO PAINTINGS, COLLAGES AND DRAWINGS. FOR SEWING WE MAKE PUPPETS, CUSHIONS, AND BEAN BAGS.WHEN WE DO WOOD WORK WE USE ALL TYPES OF WOOD LIKE BALSA,PLY,CORK AND SOME MORE.SOME TIMES WE DO WRITING.WHEN WE DO WRITING WE DO POEMS,PRAYERS AND SOME OTHERS.
